detailsandmodality: Details and modalities for the 2024-2025 academic year
admissionprocess: Admission to the Faculty of Sciences is through application screening. Candidates are ranked based on their baccalaureate grades, taking into account their stream and honors.
step1: Preparation and submission of application file
step2: Ranking of candidates by merit based on baccalaureate grades
step3: Publication of results and list of admitted candidates
importantnote: Incomplete applications or those submitted after the deadline will not be processed. Registration fees are non-refundable.
documentsnote: All documents must be certified true copies
document2: Proof of payment of registration fee (50 000 Ar)
